title: 1v1 Delay & Show Outside to Gate (12x10m)
objective: Coach body shape to delay and guide wide before tackling.
setup: Set 12x10m with two 1m gates on end line. Attacker starts central, defender 3m off.
constraints: Attacker scores by dribbling through a gate; defender scores by forcing out or delaying 5s.
progression: Add recovering teammate after 2s to reward effective delay.

title: 1v1 Wing Channel Delay (15x8m)
objective: Teach defenders to delay in wide areas and protect inside lane.
setup: Create 15x8m channel by touchline. Attacker receives facing goal; defender starts 3m away angle inside.
constraints: No tackling in first 2s—prioritize delay & show outside.
progression: Add mini goal for attacker to finish; defender earns double points if shot is forced from wide angle.

title: 1v1 End-Zone Block Near Goal (10x12m)
objective: Improve delay and block technique close to goal.
setup: Mark 2m end zone in front of mini goal. Attacker must enter end zone to finish.
constraints: Defender wins by delaying 5s or forcing attacker back out of the box.
progression: Add a second recovering defender from the top after 2s.

title: 2v1 Press with Angled Cover (15x12m)
objective: Train first defender to press and second to cover at angle protecting central lane.
setup: 15x12m grid. Attacker starts central. D1 presses, D2 3–4m behind and inside.
constraints: Only D1 may tackle until D2 calls 'set'.
progression: Allow D2 to step to double-team when attacker turns back.

title: 2v2 Compact Line Hold (16x12m)
objective: Develop pair compactness, delaying until a mistake appears.
setup: 16x12m grid with mini goal. D-pair stays within 8m width while shifting.
constraints: No slide tackles; must delay first phase.
progression: Add a time limit for attackers to shoot to reward good delay.

title: 2v2 Wide Channel Double-Up (18x8m)
objective: Coach delay then double-up in a narrow wide channel.
setup: 18x8m wide channel. Ball starts with wide attacker; inside defender provides cover.
constraints: First defender cannot tackle for 2s to emphasize delay.
progression: Allow cross to a mini goal—defenders score by blocking 3 crosses.

title: 3v2 Compact Triangle Block (22x16m)
objective: Teach compact triangle defending vs two forwards and a playmaker.
setup: 22x16m box; 3 defenders vs 2 attackers + server who can join on pass.
constraints: Defenders must recover to triangle before engaging beyond halfway.
progression: Add trailing attacker to stress cover and recovery.

title: 3v3 Narrow Block to Protect Goal (20x14m)
objective: Rehearse narrow shifting and cover to block central shots.
setup: 20x14m zone in front of goal. 3v3 with touch limit for attackers.
constraints: Defenders must keep team width ≤ 12m.
progression: Add wide gates to tempt switch then shift together.

title: 3v3 Defend Cutback Zone (18x12m)
objective: Improve cover positions to block low crosses and cutbacks.
setup: Mark 4m cutback zone by end line. Attacking wide player can enter and cut back.
constraints: Defenders score by intercepting 3 cutbacks before a goal.
progression: Add weak-side runner to coach far-post cover.

title: 4v3 Mid-Block Hold & Delay (26x18m)
objective: Coordinate a compact line of four to delay and screen through balls.
setup: 26x18m block in defensive third. 4 defenders vs 3 attackers building centrally.
constraints: Back four must keep vertical distance to mids ≤ 8m.
progression: Add a high 9 to test through-ball screening.

title: 4v4 Zone Shift & Cover (28x20m)
objective: Train coordinated lateral shifts and cover responsibilities in two lines.
setup: 28x20m grid split into three vertical lanes. 4v4 directional play.
constraints: Defenders cannot vacate lane until pass is made to it.
progression: After switch, nearest presses, others slide and cover.

title: 4v4 Box Defending vs Crosses (24x18m)
objective: Reinforce compact box defending and cover on aerial/low service.
setup: 24x18m box in front of goal; servers from both flanks deliver crosses.
constraints: Defenders must stay within 16m width when ball central.
progression: Add runner from edge to attack second phase.

title: Rondo 5v3 with Triggered Press (16x16m)
objective: Teach when to press vs delay using poor-touch and back-to-goal cues.
setup: 16x16m grid, 5v3. Defenders stay compact until a trigger appears.
constraints: Only press on clear cue; otherwise stay compact in triangle cover.
progression: On regain, play to gates for +1 point.

title: Rondo 4v2 Cover-Only Intercepts (12x12m)
objective: Develop cover angles and anticipation without tackling.
setup: 12x12m 4v2. Defenders can only intercept passes—no tackles.
constraints: Defenders must remain within 6m of each other.
progression: Add third defender to create rotating triangle.

title: Rondo Split-Gate Counter (14x14m)
objective: Link compact defending to fast counter through gates on regain.
setup: 14x14m. 5v3 or 4v2. On regain, defenders must exit via gate within 4s.
constraints: Must complete 2 passes before exit to encourage composure.
progression: Add chaser to pressure counter timing.

title: Recover & Delay 2v1 to Gate (24x16m)
objective: Build recovery speed, angle to delay, and compact cover on arrival.
setup: 24x16m with 2m gate. Ball lost near halfway; attackers break 2v1.
constraints: Defender wins if attack delayed ≥6s or forced wide through gate.
progression: Add trailing defender after 3s to create 2v2.

title: Recovery Triangle 3v2 (26x18m)
objective: Train two recovering defenders to re-form compact triangle with a holding mid.
setup: 26x18m; 3 attackers vs 2 recovering defenders + late DM arriving.
constraints: Attack must shoot within 8s; defenders earn 2 points if triangle formed first.
progression: Release DM arrival earlier as players improve.

title: Last Defender Delay in Central Lane (22x12m)
objective: Coach lone defender to delay centrally and protect the goal lane.
setup: 22x12m corridor. Attacker drives at speed; defender retreats shaping inside.
constraints: No tackle in first 2s; point for forcing back pass.
progression: Add recovering chaser from behind attacker.

title: Central Box Screen 2v2 (18x14m)
objective: Protect central box by delaying and screening through passes.
setup: 18x14m with a 6x6m 'no-entry' central box for defenders to screen.
constraints: Attackers cannot run through box; must pass around to finish.
progression: Allow entry after 5 passes to test cover reactions.

title: Central Gate Protect 3v3 (20x15m)
objective: Reinforce compactness by guarding central gates and delaying shots.
setup: 20x15m; two central 1m gates 8m from goal. 3v3 directional.
constraints: Goals only count if the through pass goes via a gate.
progression: Add third gate wide to provoke shifting.

title: Central Box Press Cues 4v3 (22x16m)
objective: Teach when to press vs delay around a central hot-zone.
setup: 22x16m with 8x6m central hot-zone. 4 defenders vs 3 attackers.
constraints: Only press into hot-zone on poor touch/back-to-goal; otherwise screen.
progression: Reduce hot-zone size as players improve.

title: Switch & Shift Compact 4v4 (30x20m)
objective: Improve lateral compactness and cover against quick switches.
setup: 30x20m with three lanes. Attackers circulate to switch; defenders slide as a block.
constraints: Defensive width must stay ≤ 18m when ball central.
progression: Add target wide player to force bigger shifts.

title: Defend Low & High Crosses 4v3 (24x18m)
objective: Coach compact positions to stop cutbacks and crosses.
setup: 24x18m; flanking servers alternate low/high crosses vs 3 attackers.
constraints: Defenders earn 1 pt for first-ball, 1 pt for second-ball clearance.
progression: Add late edge runner for rebounds.

title: Switch Trap & Delay 3v3 (24x16m)
objective: Set traps to invite switch then delay while sliding compactly.
setup: 24x16m; defenders overload ball side and leave far lane baited.
constraints: Points for forcing a switch+delay >4s before entry.
progression: Allow diagonal skip pass to test recover.

title: Drop & Block Box Defense (26x18m)
objective: Rehearse dropping together to protect box and delay shots.
setup: 26x18m in front of goal. Start with ball wide; defenders drop in unison.
constraints: Line must stay within 8m vertically to midfield.
progression: Add opposite switch then shot scenario.

title: Protect Cutback Lane 4v4 (22x16m)
objective: Improve recognition and cover of the 'cutback lane' inside the box.
setup: 22x16m; wide attacker can drive end line to cut back.
constraints: Goals only from cutbacks to central lane.
progression: Let weak-side join late to test far-post cover.

title: Goal-Line Scramble Compactness (16x14m)
objective: Build compact reactions under second-ball chaos near goal.
setup: 16x14m; coach serves rebounds/deflections toward six-yard area.
constraints: Defenders must keep ≤ 10m team width.
progression: Add call of 'step!' to trigger coordinated push out.

title: 2v3 Numbers-Down Delay (24x16m)
objective: Coach delaying and compact cover when outnumbered.
setup: 24x16m; attackers have 8s to score; 2 defenders aim to delay and funnel.
constraints: No tackles first 2s; points for delays ≥6s.
progression: Release a third defender after 3s to re-balance.

title: 3v4 Low Block Hold (24x18m)
objective: Practice compact low block to deny central penetration.
setup: 24x18m; 3 defenders vs 4 attackers, play starts at top of box.
constraints: Defensive width ≤ 14m at all times.
progression: Add edge shooter to train stepping to ball.

title: 1v2 Last Defender Delay (22x14m)
objective: Train single defender to delay vs two attackers until cover returns.
setup: 22x14m; two attackers break from halfway; defender retreats inside lane.
constraints: No tackle first 2s; score if delay ≥6s.
progression: Release chaser to create 2v2 after 3s.

title: Width-Control Gate Game 3v3 (20x15m)
objective: Control team width while delaying to block central gates.
setup: 20x15m with two central gates 5m apart. 3v3 directional.
constraints: Defensive team width must stay ≤ 12m when ball central.
progression: Add third gate wide to test shifting discipline.

title: Depth-Control Line Compact 4v4 (28x18m)
objective: Manage vertical distances between lines while delaying progression.
setup: 28x18m with a 'line gap' stripe; two lines must stay ≤ 8m apart.
constraints: Free kicks restart from stripe to test reset speed.
progression: Add target players just beyond stripe.

title: Compact Pivot Screen 3v3 (20x14m)
objective: Screen the pivot pass while delaying and covering runners.
setup: 20x14m; one attacker acts as pivot target; defenders screen central lane.
constraints: Attacking goals only count via pivot combination.
progression: Allow pivot to float to new pocket to force shifting.
